str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
(a) of persons: powerful, able, (b) of things: possible. From dunamai; powerful or capable; neuter possible.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To be peaceful, keep the peace, be at peace. From eirene; to be peaceful.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
